strings.Value: "If you need to get over yourself to do this, Ekun, then don't."
{n}The wolf who was standing nearby before wags his tail and approaches Ekun.{/n}
"Aww... just look at that, Ekun! He seems so loyal! You have to give him a name!"
"You do. You've been together for so long, you've been through so much together..."
{n}Ntavi shakes her head.{/n} "The heart wants what it wants. Why would one fake affection when there is none?"
"His loyalty's appreciated. Not ready to decide his fate, though."
{n}Looking at the dog and thinking for a moment, Ekun smiles slightly.{/n} "His name is Okbo."
{n}Elina looks at Ekun and seems to forget about the whole world for a moment.{/n} "That's better!"
"By the way, friends... Not to sound too mundane, but I'm quite tired, and we still have to get to the city. Maybe it's time we pack up?"
